creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: woven cotton panel with gray, purple and light blue stripes; embroidered red, yellow, white and blue geometric shapes alternate across panes; two end have gold embroidery lining ends; two of the opposite corners have the word 'SALLI' embroidered in capital letters
markings: in corner, stitched label, hand written over typed text: A-280 A-280-D
title: Panel
